thread.section_title: Roger Smith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: different vibe, good deal
thread.title_full: different vibe, good deal - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lacascada
title: different vibe, good deal
text: Very friendly staff, comfortable rooms, decor was New England bed and breakfast like,which was a little unusual for the location, and it felt like an old NYC apartment building was probably converted to a hotel (which felt nostalgic for me) , but I liked it. Good deal for the location. I really appreciated the complimentary yogurt and granola (which was very yummy). ... In room fridge was nice for leftovers too,
